name: Nonstop Knight
summary: Idle with heroes in nonstop adventures, test your skills and survive hordes of enemies in endless dungeons. Tackle the offline idle adventure while your hero earns rewards and loots even while you're taking a break. Play actively whenever you like, fight in short sessions in your coffee break or engage in longer sessions if you wish. The best is you progress even when you are afk or offline and keep collecting gold and loot: Idle with no internet!
